oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Carl Perkins Press Release
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Moeller Talent, Inc.; Offset printing; Perkins, Carl, 1932-1998;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A black and white negative taped to and framed by a masking sheet advertising Carl Perkins. The text describes Perkins' musical history, his latest hits, and time playing in Las Vegas. The negative features a photograph of Carl Perkins and would have been used to create a corresponding printing plate.
